docs.title: QA Test Management System
docs.text: Welcome to our Test Management System. This system is designed to manage test cases and test suites using a Git-based approach.

docs.title: Quick Links
docs.text:
• Test Cases
  • Test Suites
  • Shared Steps

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Git-based version control
  • :material-markdown: Markdown format
  • Table view support
  • Powerful search
  • Tags and categories

docs.title: Test Case IDs
docs.text: Format: TC-[NUMBER] Example: TC-001, TC-002

docs.title: Test Cases
docs.text: Format: [feature]_[scenario].md Examples: - login_valid_credentials.md - login_invalid_password.md - profile_update_email.md

docs.title: Test Suites
docs.text: Format: [feature]_suite.md Examples: - authentication_suite.md - profile_management_suite.md

docs.title: Shared Steps
docs.text: Format: [action]_steps.md Examples: - login_steps.md - navigation_steps.md

docs.title: Component Names
docs.text:
• Use PascalCase
  • Be specific but concise Examples:
  • UserAuthentication
  • ProfileManagement
  • OrderProcessing

docs.title: Tags
docs.text:
• Use lowercase
  • Use hyphens for spaces Examples:
  • smoke-test
  • regression
  • high-priority
  • needs-review

docs.title: Test Step Actions
docs.text:
• Start with verb
  • Be clear and concise Examples:
  • "Click login button"
  • "Enter username"
  • "Verify error message"

docs.title: Variables
docs.text: Format: {VARIABLE_NAME} Examples: - {USERNAME} - {PASSWORD} - {ERROR_MESSAGE}

docs.title: Format
docs.text:
Test cases should follow this numbering format: 

[Module]-[SubModule]-[Type]-[Number]

Example: AUTH-LOG-FUN-001

docs.title: Components:
docs.text:
1. Module Code (2-4 chars)
  2. AUTH: Authentication
  3. USR: User Management
  4. GIFT: Gift Management

  5. ORD: Order Management etc.

  6. SubModule Code (2-3 chars)

  7. LOG: Login
  8. REG: Registration

  9. PROF: Profile etc.

  10. Type Code (2-3 chars)

  11. FUN: Functional
  12. SEC: Security
  13. PERF: Performance
  14. UI: User Interface

  15. API: API Testing

  16. Number (3 digits)

  17. Sequential number starting from 001

docs.title: Examples:
docs.text:
• AUTH-LOG-FUN-001: Authentication - Login - Functional Test #1
  • GIFT-PDP-UI-001: Gift - Product Detail Page - UI Test #1
  • USR-PROF-API-001: User - Profile - API Test #1

docs.title: Best Practices:
docs.text:
1. Always use uppercase for module, submodule, and type codes
  2. Always use 3 digits for the number portion
  3. Keep a central registry of module and submodule codes
  4. When adding a new test case, use the next available number in its category
  5. Never reuse numbers, even if old test cases are deleted

docs.title: Structure
docs.text:
Each test case should include:

  1. Metadata (YAML frontmatter): 

    ---
title: Test Case Title
id: TC-XXX
component: Component Name
priority: High/Medium/Low
status: Active/Draft/Deprecated
tags: [tag1, tag2]
---

  2. Test Objective

  3. Clear statement of what is being tested

  4. One sentence, specific and measurable

  5. Prerequisites

  6. System state before test execution
  7. Required data or configurations

  8. Dependencies on other test cases

  9. Test Steps

  10. Use table format for clarity
  11. Each step should be atomic
  12. Include test data

  13. Clear expected results

  14. Post-conditions

  15. System state after test execution
  16. Cleanup steps if needed

docs.title: Best Practices
docs.text:
1. Naming Convention
  2. Use descriptive names
  3. Follow the pattern: [Feature]_[Scenario].md

  4. Example: login_valid_credentials.md

  5. Test Data

  6. Use realistic data
  7. Separate test data from test steps

  8. Use variables for reusable data

  9. Reusability

  10. Use shared steps for common actions
  11. Reference prerequisites clearly

  12. Keep test cases atomic

  13. Documentation

  14. Include relevant screenshots or diagrams
  15. Document edge cases
  16. Keep test cases up to date

docs.title: Example
docs.text: See Login Test Case for a complete example.

docs.title: Navigate to Gift List
docs.text:
id: NAV-001
title: Navigate to Gift List
description: Common steps to navigate to the Gift list page

docs.title: Steps
docs.text: Step Action Expected Result 1 Click on Promotion/Gift link in the navigation menu System redirects to Gift list page 2 Wait for page load Gift list page is displayed

docs.title: Navigate to Create Gift
docs.text:
id: NAV-002
title: Navigate to Create Gift Form
description: Common steps to navigate to Create Gift form

docs.title: Steps
docs.text: Step Action Expected Result 1 Click "Create Gift" button Create Gift form is displayed 2 Wait for form load All required fields are visible

docs.title: Test Objective
docs.text: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
1. User has a valid account
  2. User is not currently logged in
  3. System is accessible

docs.title: Test Steps
docs.text: Step Action Expected Result Test Data 1 Navigate to login page Login form is displayed N/A 2 Enter valid username Username is accepted user@example.com 3 Enter valid password Password field shows dots Password123! 4 Click login button User is successfully logged in N/A

docs.title: Post-conditions
docs.text:
• User is logged in
  • User is redirected to dashboard
  • Session is created

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
• Test on supported browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari
  • Check "Remember me" functionality in separate test case

docs.title: AUTH-LOG-FUN-002: Invalid Login Attempt
[D4B-3009] Navigate to Gift List
docs.text:
id: D4B-3009
title: Verify user will redirect to Gift list when click on Promotion/Gift
component: Gift Management
priority: High
status: Active
tags: [gift, navigation, smoke-test]

docs.title: Test Objective
docs.text: Verify that users can successfully navigate to the Gift list page from Promotion/Gift link

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• User is logged in
  • User has permission to view gifts

docs.title: Test Steps
docs.text: {{ ../shared-steps/navigation.md }}

docs.title: Expected Results
docs.text:
• Gift list page is displayed
  • URL changes to /gifts
  • Gift list title is visible

docs.title: [D4B-3010] Gift List Fields
docs.text:
id: D4B-3010
title: Verify Gift list has 6 fields
component: Gift Management
priority: High
status: Active
tags: [gift, ui, regression]

docs.title: Test Objective
docs.text: Verify that Gift list displays all required fields correctly

docs.title: Test Steps
docs.text: Step Action Expected Result 1 Navigate to Gift list Gift list page is displayed 2 Verify table headers Following columns are present: - Gift ID - Name - Value - Quantity - Status - Actions

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
• All columns should be sortable
  • Actions column should contain Edit and Delete buttons
  • Status should show active/inactive indicator

docs.title: [D4B-3013] Gift Search
docs.text:
id: D4B-3013
title: Verify system will show valid data if user input giftId in search box
component: Gift Management
priority: Medium
status: Active
tags: [gift, search, regression]

docs.title: Test Objective
docs.text: Verify that the search functionality correctly filters gifts by ID

docs.title: Test Data
docs.text:
{
  "validGiftId": "GIFT-001",
  "invalidGiftId": "INVALID-001"
}

docs.title: Test Steps
docs.text: Step Action Expected Result Test Data 1 Navigate to Gift list Gift list page is displayed 2 Enter valid gift ID in search box Search box accepts input validGiftId 3 Press Enter or click Search Results are filtered 4 Verify search results Only matching gift is displayed 5 Clear search box 6 Enter invalid gift ID Search box accepts input invalidGiftId 7 Press Enter or click Search "No results found" message is displayed

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
• Search should be case-insensitive
  • Partial gift ID matches should be supported
  • Search should execute after 500ms of user stopping typing

docs.title: [GIFT-LIST-FUN-001] View Gift List
docs.text:
title: View Gift List
id: GIFT-LIST-FUN-001
component: Gift Management
priority: High
status: Active
tags:
  - gift
  - navigation
last_updated: 2024-12-24

docs.title: Test Objective
docs.text: Verify that users can successfully navigate to the Gift list page from Promotion/Gift link

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• User is logged in
  • User has permission to view gifts

docs.title: Test Steps
docs.text: Step Action Expected Result 1 Click on Promotion/Gift link in the navigation menu System redirects to Gift list page 2 Wait for page load Gift list page is displayed

docs.title: Expected Results
docs.text:
• Gift list page is displayed
  • URL changes to /gifts
  • Gift list title is visible

docs.title: Notes
docs.text:
• This test case is part of the basic navigation test suite
  • Should be included in smoke tests

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: Test suite for Gift PDP functionality including view, create, and search features.

docs.title: View List Feature
docs.text:
1. [D4B-3009] Verify user will redirect to Gift list when click on Promotion/Gift
  2. [D4B-3010] Verify Gift list has 6 fields
  3. [D4B-3011] Verify user will redirect to Create Biz Gift when click on Create Biz Gift
  4. [D4B-3012] Verify user will redirect to Create Mall Gift when click on Create Mall Gift
  5. [D4B-3013] Verify system will show valid data if user input giftId in search box

docs.title: Create Gift Feature
docs.text:
1. [D4B-3020] Verify required fields validation
  2. [D4B-3021] Verify gift creation for Business
  3. [D4B-3022] Verify gift creation for Mall

docs.title: Test Data
docs.text:
{
  "validGift": {
    "name": "Test Gift Card",
    "description": "Digital gift card for testing",
    "value": 100,
    "quantity": 50,
    "expiryDays": 30,
    "type": "DIGITAL"
  },
  "searchData": {
    "validGiftId": "GIFT-001",
    "invalidGiftId": "INVALID-001"
  }
}

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• User must be logged in with admin privileges
  • Test data must be prepared in the database

docs.title: Environment
docs.text:
• Testing Environment: Staging
  • Browser Requirements: Chrome (latest), Firefox (latest)
  • Mobile Responsiveness: Required
